item.title: nurses may help some overweight kids
item.description: a program including regular follow-ups with nurses and focused attempts to cut back on tv, fast food, and sodas appears to keep some overweight and obese kids from gaining more weight, according to a new study.

item.title: louisiana braces as flood spillway opens

item.title: louisiana cities brace for river peak as bayou floods
